reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress lovely and versatile, with soft fabric that's comfortable and lightweight.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: This dress is way above and beyond the quality I was expecting for the price. It feels silky and very opaque, yet light weight. I love the pockets. The sleeve length is great and not tight around the biceps. I would say it runs a little big. I normally order large shirts and I ordered a medium and it still feels roomy. Very comfortable and flattering. Read more
items.author: L M E

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mini
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: Nice material Read more
items.author: ELL

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size down
items.body: Side down! Maybe two sizes it is so cute but it comes very large Read more
items.author: Veronica Cardenas

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE but Order up, it shrinks!
items.body: I absolutely love every. single. thing. about this dress: color selection, length, zipper / pocket accents, it technically was an empire waist on me but I’m larger on top. Well, I’m kinda large anyways, 5’2”, 38 DD and about 200 lbs. I bought an xl and xxl thinking it ran large since some reviews said that. HOWEVER it shrank when I washed it! In cold water mind you and half dried. I’m soooo sad, cant wear it to a wedding today like I had hoped. However, this dress comes in a 3 X so I’ll be doing that. So that’s why I gave a 3 star. If you are plump-a-licious order up and you’ll be smoking hot! Read more
items.author: Michael Boone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Style
items.body: Stylish dress for summer or fall. Make sure you’re careful on the sizing. The first one I ordered was the XXL and it was too big so I ordered the XL and it fit perfect. Read more
items.author: Carolinagirl

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size is off
items.body: Runs big, I’m 5’7 and a small/medium 135lbs. I ordered a small and it was way too wide. I also have a long torso, so I was surprised that it was so long on the back side. The sleeves were also too short. I would have returned it but I washed it in hopes that it would shrink a little. It didn’t… Read more
items.author: Roxanne Flores

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Causal and professional (Runs a little Big)
items.body: I am happy with this purchase! The dress looks like the picture and is made of a seemingly good quality material (haven’t washed it yet). This is a nice casual dress for church and it zips down so I can breastfeed easily! I do feel it runs large. I bought a Medium (136lbs, 5’5”) and it seemed really baggy, especially around the shoulders. I gave it to a friend and ordered a small and it fit perfect! Comfortable dress but still professional. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars White button up shirt
items.body: Love the shirt can’t wait to wear it this Read more
items.author: Tamatha Griffith

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Army Green-036, White, Pink-036, Apricot-036, Black, Green-036, Purple-036, Light Blue-036, Navy Blue, Black-036, Yellow-036, White-036. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
